content: In our IG generated using the IG Publisher, on pages for example resources, it seems something is going wrong with links to other example resources. The links that you would expect to lead to a page for another example actually link back to the page you are currently on. For an example of this, see: http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-mCODE-ig/Observation-mCODETNMClinicalStageGroupExample01.html. You would expect that the link on that page in the subject field to mCODEPatientExample01 would link to here http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-mCODE-ig/Patient-mCODEPatientExample01.html, but it actually just links back to the page we are already on. This seems to be the case across all of our example pages. Any thoughts on why this is happening?
Did this get sorted out @Nick Freiter ?
Looks like it is linking correctly now, thanks!
